synopsis.text:
English-subtitled series, "Hajime Kindaichi," follows the seemingly ordinary high school student who transforms into a remarkable detective when faced with intricate mysteries. As the grandson of Japan's renowned detective, Kousuke Kindaichi, Hajime possesses an extraordinary intellect and an uncanny ability to solve the most complex and unsettling cases.

Accompanied by his sharp-witted and perceptive childhood friend, Miyuki Nanase, Hajime embarks on thrilling adventures to remote islands, dangerous cities, and hostile territories. Together, they unravel some of the world's most sophisticated and grueling enigmas, proving that Hajime is not just an average student but a true successor to his grandfather's legacy.

With his lax demeanor and disorganized appearance, Hajime might not fit the typical image of a detective, but his genius mind and deductive skills make him an unstoppable force in the world of crime-solving. Don't miss out on the gripping adventures of Hajime Kindaichi and his relentless pursuit of the truth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
